授業方法: This class will be conducted face-to-face. The class will be held in English as a communicative 4-skills workshop. Active participation is expected from all students. For those students who are permitted to take classes online, the data recorded from the face-to-face class will be recorded and shared via a URL posted in the LUNA class page. Class assignments can be submitted via email.
